title: Iman Bowie, 64, looks elegant as she collects second trophy of the week at FGI Night of Stars Gala
text:
Her week started on quite the celebratory note, when she was handed a trophy at the 13th annual Golden Heart Awards in New York City on Monday night.

And Iman Bowie, 64, kept the mood going on Thursday, when she was honoured at Fashion Group International's Night of Stars Gala, held at NYC's Cipriani Wall Street.

The stunning supermodel wowed as she arrived at the exclusive star-studded event in a flattering ruched burgundy sleeveless gown, which hugged her curves.

Night on the town: Iman Bowie was honoured at the Fashion Group International's Night of Stars Gala, held at New York City's Cipriani Wall Street on Thursday night

She teamed the floor-length dress with black strappy heels, while accessorising with a range of bold jewellery that included glittering bracelets and drop earrings.

Wearing her raven tresses in impeccably coiffed shoulder-length curls, the mother-of-two rounded out her look with smokey eyeshadow and nude lipstick.

The Somali-American beauty's attendance at the event came just days after she received top honours at the Golden Heart Awards.

Honoured: The supermodel was honoured at the gala, picking up her second award in a week

Breathtaking: The stunning supermodel wowed as she arrived at the exclusive star-studded event in a flattering ruched burgundy sleeveless gown, which hugged her curves

Glittering: She teamed the floor-length dress with black strappy heels, while accessorising with a range of bold jewellery that included glittering bracelets and drop earrings

Mother-of-two Iman was awarded the coveted Michael Kors Award for Outstanding Community Service.

The award ceremony was presented by God's Love We Deliver, a charity organisation that works to provide meals to and end hunger among people living with HIV/AIDS, as well as other serious illnesses.

Meanwhile, earlier this year on April 24, Iman paid tribute to her late husband David on what would have been their 27th wedding anniversary.

Taking to her Instagram page, where she regularly shares inspirational quotes and updates about her life, Iman wrote: 'April 24th Forever Love.#BowieForever.'

Tress-ed to impress: Wearing her raven tresses in impeccably coiffed shoulder-length curls, the mother-of-two rounded out her look with smokey eyeshadow and nude lipstick

Proud moment: After receiving her trophy, fashion star posed alongside actress Laverne Cox

Three of us: The stars also posed for a snapshot with FGI president and CEO Maryanne Grisz

The couple married on April 24, 1992 in a private ceremony in Lausanne, Switzerland.

Their union was solemnised in Florence, Italy, on June 6 that year. They welcomed their daughter Alexandria, known as Lexi, in 2000.

Legendary musician Bowie died in 2016 aged 69 following a battle with cancer.

After retiring from modelling in 1989, Iman founded Iman Cosmetics, now a $25 million-a-year business, based on makeup for women of colour.

Models: During the event, Iman posed for pictures with fellow supermodel Christy Turlington

Celebrated designer: They were joined at their table by celebrated designer Donna Karan, 71
